          <title>
            <string language="en">The Plough movement in sky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Pflugbewegung im Himmel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement de charrue en ciel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento do plough no céu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il movimento dell'aratro in cielo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μετακίνηση αρότρων στον ουρανό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El movimiento del arado en cielo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Plough stars pattern at midnight and 6 hours later.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plough</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Pflugsternmuster an 
Mitternacht und 6 Stunden später.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que la charrue 
tient le premier rôle la configuration le minuit et 6 heures à plus tard.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o teste padrão das 
estrelas do plough a meia-noite e as 6 horas em mais tarde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il modello delle 
stelle dell'aratro la mezzanotte e 6 ore a più successivamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πρότυπο αστεριών αρότρων
σε μεσάνυχτα και 6 ώρες αργότερα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el modelo de las 
estrellas del arado en la medianoche y 6 horas más adelante.</string>
          </description>
